title: Search-Based Generative Learning: Project-Based Training for Language Proficiency Improvement [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher language proficiency and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A constrained technological environment using only smartphones, emphasizing practical language application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can extract and search core keywords from given language problems with 80%+ accuracy
Learners generate meaningful content through three or more creative reconstruction activities based on search results
Learners demonstrate clear logical structures in 90% of peer-reviewed outputs
Learners achieve 75%+ effective utilization of search-creation integration strategies across four or more formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
